content: 3 long spiral ties using a loose relaxed gauge chain 90 + 1 in the second to last chain work 3 single_crochet place 3 single_crochet into every stitch for 20 stitches this creates approximately 6 distinct spirals after spirals have been created turn your foundation chain to expose the back bumps slip_stitch 1 into each back bump for 70 stitches if you d like shorter ties you can subtract the initial chain amount by multiples of 20 + 1 i wouldn t recommend going below 50 chains for the ties to ensure enough space to properly tie and secure the headband @chelseacrochets_ 4 body of headband + increases at the end of your chain chain an additional 2 yo and half_double_crochet 3 into the middle stitch found between the foundation chain and the last slip_stitch chain 1 and turn work yo and half_double_crochet increase in yo and half_double_crochet increase in the each stitch across 6 first 2 stitches half_double_crochet 1 chain 1 and turn work then half_double_crochet increase in the last two stitches 9 chain 1 and turn work yo and half_double_crochet 1 into each stitch across 9 for 13 more row for a total of 16 row worked in half_double_crochet or until desired length @chelseacrochets_ 5 body of headband + puff stitches chain 3 skip one stitch yo and place a ps in the next stitch pull up a total of 7 loops on your hook yo and pull through all 7 loops chain 2 skip a stitch and ps chain 2 skip a stitch and ps repeat this across the row you should have a total of 4 puff stitches in each row chain 2 and in the last chain space work a double_crochet ❗ each row of puff stitch will start with a chain 2 and end with a ❗ double_crochet continue on with this pattern for a total of 15 row or until desired length @chelseacrochets_ 6 body of headband + decreases chain 2 half_double_crochet 9 times across working one half_double_crochet into the chain 2 space and one half_double_crochet on top of the puff stitches worked in the row below chain 2 and turn work half_double_crochet 1 into each stitch across 9 for 13 more row for a total of 14 row worked in half_double_crochet or until desired length before beginning decrease stitches row 15 chain 1 and turn work half_double_crochet decrease in the next 4 stitches yo and half_double_crochet into the next 3 stitches yo and half_double_crochet decrease in the next 2 stitches 6 row 16 chain 1 and turn work half_double_crochet decrease in all 6 stitches across 3 chain 1 and turn work skip one stitch and slip_stitch into the top of the second half_double_crochet decrease you made in row 16 @chelseacrochets_ 7 for the second tie please see instructions for long spiral ties on page 4 after the very last slip_stitch place an additional slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet decrease you made in row 16 fasten_off and weave in ends congratulations you re
